void PottsGraphPPM::writeModelFile ( FILE *  modeFile  ) 

generates the ampl model file

  • modelFile

void PottsGraphPPM::getAMPL ( string  modelFileName,
string  dataFileName,
string  commandFileName 
)

generates the ampl files for simulating a single ppm iteration

  • modelFileName the AMPL model file generated
  • dataFileName the AMPL data file generated
  • commandFileName the file containing AMPL execution code
    Note:
    The AMPL code has the following parameters:
    params: q, c_alpha(rgn), numVar(rgn), b1_rgn(1..q^n) , p2_rgn(1..q^n)
    vars: b2_rgn(1..q^n, 1..q^n)
